======
README
======

Let's test the source code with our custom checker:

  >>> import p01.checker
  >>> import j01.form

  >>> skipFileNames = [
  ...     'j01.columns.css',
  ...     'j01.form.css',
  ...     'j01.form.css',
  ...     'j01.form.dropdowns.css',
  ...     'j01.form.forms.css',
  ...     'j01.form.select.css',
  ...     'reboot.css',
  ... ]

  >>> skipFolderNames = [
  ...     'plugins',
  ... ]

  >>> checker = p01.checker.Checker()
  >>> checker.check(j01.form, skipFileNames=skipFileNames,
  ...     skipFolderNames=skipFolderNames)
